mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRO_CODE, PRO_NAME, PRO_PETS, PRO_TYPE, PRO_CATEGORY, PRO_FILTER1, PRO_FILTER2, PRO_DISCOUNT, PRO_ONOFF) VALUES (#{proCode}, #{proName}, #{petType}, #{proType}, #{proDetailType}, #{filterType1}, #{filterType2}, #{proDiscount}, #{productStatus})

INSERT INTO PRODUCT_OPTION (PROOPT_NAME, PROOPT_PRICE, PROOPT_STOCK, PRO_CODE, PROOPT_FINALPRICE, PROOPT_CODE) VALUES (#{optionName}, #{optionPrice}, #{optionCount}, #{proCode}, #{finalPrice}, #{optCode})
mapper.select: SELECT PRO_CODE, PRO_NAME, PRO_PETS, PRO_TYPE, PRO_CATEGORY, PRO_FILTER1, PRO_FILTER2, PRO_DISCOUNT, PRO_ONOFF FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_CODE = #{proCode}

SELECT MAIN_IMG1, MAIN_IMG2, MAIN_IMG3, MAIN_IMG4, MAIN_IMG5, DES_IMG1, DES_IMG2, DES_IMG3, DES_IMG4, DES_IMG5, DES_IMG6, DES_IMG7, DES_IMG8, DES_IMG9, DES_IMG10 FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE WHERE PRO_CODE = #{proCode}
